tool_description: Search 25 million datasets in thousands of repositories across the web on Google Dataset Search in real-time as seen on datasetsearch.research.google.com.
name: Real-Time Dataset Search
title: Real-Time Dataset Search

api_list.name: Search Datasets

optional_parameters.name: last_updated
optional_parameters.description:
Only return datasets updated in a specific time period.

**Allowed values:** `ALL`, `MONTH`, `YEAR`, `3_YEARS`.
**Default:** `ALL`.

optional_parameters.name: download_format
optional_parameters.description:
Return datasets with specific download formats, specified as a comma (,) delimited list of download formats to match.

**Allowed values:** `TABULAR`, `DOCUMENT`, `IMAGE`, `TEXT`, `ARCHIVE`, `STRUCTURED`, `OTHER`.

**e.g.** *`TABULAR`*
**e.g.** *`TABULAR,DOCUMENT,ARCHIVE`*

optional_parameters.name: usage_rights
optional_parameters.description:
Only return datasets with specific usage rights.

**Allowed values:** `ALL`, `COMMERCIAL`, `NONCOMMERCIAL`.
**Default:** `ALL`.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Number of results to skip / offset.

**Allowed values:** `Positive integers`.
**Default:** `0`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to return.

**Allowed values:** `0-100`.
**Default:** `10`.

optional_parameters.name: topics
optional_parameters.description:
Return datasets in specific topics, specified as a comma (,) delimited list of topics to match.

**Allowed values:** `HUMANITIES`, `SOCIAL_SCIENCES`, `LIFE_SCIENCES`, `AGRICULTURE`, `NATURAL_SCIENCES`, `GEO_SCIENCES`, `COMPUTING`, 
 `AGRICULTURE_AND_URBAN_PLANNING`, `ENGINEERING`.

**e.g.** *`HUMANITIES`*
**e.g.** *`HUMANITIES, SOCIAL_SCIENCES, COMPUTING`*
